alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Noxubee, southeastern Oktibbeha and southwestern Lowndes Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oktoc, or 11 miles southeast of Starkville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crawford around 240 PM CDT. Brooksville around 300 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
